name: FrankenPatch
description:
You find yourself in a large area filled with grass, pumpkins, the occasional cauliflower, and ... zombies!? Fight off the horde and smash all the pumpkins to earn points and save the garden -- what is left of it, I guess?.

Controls:

Arrow keys: Move around / navigate menu;

Z: Sprint;

X: Attack;

Spacebar / Enter: Advance & forward dialogue text;

Q / Escape: Return to main menu (when in-game);

It was a lot of fun to work on this game for the Cozy Autumn gamejam. I hope people will also enjoy playing it. Development will continue after the jam ends!

Special thanks to my alpha testers Fung and CmpMean, and CmpMean again for creating the beehive texture!
